T02D2960:43a-0: @43a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pha la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2960:43a-1: gzhan gyis bshig par dka' ba'i rig sngags kyi las 'grub par 'dod na /
T02D2960:43b-0: sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas @43b
T02D2960:43b-1: khang[?] yid dang mthun par mandal sngon po khru do'i
T02D2960:43b-2: tshad dang ldan par bya ste me tog dmar po
T02D2960:43b-3: dang sngon po rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i tshom
T02D2960:43b-4: bu lnga'am / bdun nam bcu gcig bkram la blam
T02D2960:43b-5: dang yi dam mdun gyi bar snang la sbyan drangs
T02D2960:43b-6: bu lnga'am / te / phyi nang gi mchod pa
T02D2960:43b-7: rdzogs par phul te 'dod pa'i don la gsol pa
T02D2960:43b-8: bu lnga'am / te / gdab par bya'o // de
T02D2960:43b-9: nas sgrub pa pos gos dmar po dri ma med
T02D2960:43b-10: bu lnga'am / te / gdab par bya'o // pa
T02D2960:43b-11: bgos te / khrus byas la sdig pa ma lus
T02D2960:43b-13: sems bskyed pa dang bsrung ba dang tshad med pa bsgom par mos pa byas la /
T02D2960:43b-14: stong pa nyid dang gzhal yas khang bsgom pa rnams bya ste /
T02D2960:43b-15: khro bo'i rgyal po rtam grin sku mdog dmar po
T02D2960:43b-16: zhal dmar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa rta mgo
T02D2960:43b-17: ljang gu'i steng na rdo rje rnam par 'joms pas
T02D2960:43b-18: dbu brgyan pa / padma dang be con dang lcags kyu dang sdigs mdzub la sbyar ba'o //
T02D2960:43b-19: de la ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te /
T02D2960:43b-20: dbang bskur ba la sogs te de'i rjes la bdag
T02D2960:43b-21: nyid kyi lus kyang padma'i sdong po ze 'bru legs
T02D2960:43b-23: bdag gi lus rdo rje chen por rang byung ba gcig tu dmigs pa byas la /
T02D2960:43b-24: pha rol gyi gnod pa gang gis kyang bshig par dka' ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2960:43b-25: de nas de nyid las 'od 'phros pas 'phags pa mchod pa dang /
T02D2960:43b-26: sems can gyi don bya ba la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2960:43b-27: 'od zer de dag rdo rje nyid la thim pas
T02D2960:43b-28: sgrub pa po'i lus ngag la pha rol gyi gnod
T02D2960:43b-29: pa'i tshogs gang gis kyang mi shigs par bsgom mo
T02D2960:43b-30: // de nas rdo rje de nyid las rang sgra
T02D2960:43b-31: chen po 'di dag rnams rang bzhin gyis 'byung par
T02D2960:43b-32: mos par bya zhing yid kyis sngags 'di nyid la
T02D2960:43b-33: nyi ma re la sum brgya bzlas te mandal re
T02D2960:43b-34: // dbul bar bya'o // aom spho ta badzra badzra /
T02D2960:43b-35: ma ta badzra h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes sngags brjod pa la mandal re dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2960:43b-36: de ltar zla ba gcig la dus gsum gyi nyi
T02D2960:43b-37: ma re re de ltar cho ga rdzogs par bya
T02D2960:43b-38: zhing ma 'khrul bar byas na bdag nyid kyi lus
T02D2960:43b-39: rdo rje lta bur gyur pa la the tshom med
T02D2960:43b-40: do // mi shigs pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi
T02D2960:43b-41: tshig lag tu blang ba man ngag gis bsgrub pa'i
T02D2960:43b-42: rnal 'byor pa'i tshe dang stobs bsgrub pa zhes bya
